name: 8th World Biotechnology Congress
content: We are excited to welcome all of you to the “8th World Biotechnology Congress”. Which is scheduled to place in Madrid, Spain on October 04-05, 2021\. The conference is organizing around the theme “Advances in Biotechnology: Research and Innovations”. This conference main goal is to reach out the advancement and innovations in the field of biotechnology by bringing together people from over the world to share their experience. Biotechnology 2021 aims to encourage, conduct, and facilitate interdisciplinary research on biotechnology. This conference would bring together young and brilliant scholars, business delegates, and emerging research groups from all over the world to promote high-quality research. This is the international gathering where biotechnologists from various departments discuss their findings and exchange ideas with senior scientists in a collaborative environment. They will also have the opportunity to network with colleagues from around the world, develop their management and communication capabilities, and enhance their analytical and analysis skills. Workshops, oral lectures, poster sessions and special discussions about a wide range of biotechnology will be a part of the conference. The characteristics feature of the biotechnology 2021 includes keynote lectures and plenary talks by eminent personalities and addition to contributed articles, both oral and poster presentations will be given by eminent personalities from around the world.
